name: Cave (SpeakerFish)
description:
Discover randomly generated dungeons and find gold chests! You can buy health-box and if you find enough gold, you will be able to buy DIAMOND IRON! In future i will add more items to store.

  • Randomly generated dungeons
  • Different monsters
  • Good music (OST)
Creators

Game by SpeakerFish (DanielOschepkov)

Music by Siege (Andrey Slastenov)

Software

Powered by ITsMagic Engine

Music FL Studio

Some textures was taken from license-free resources, other assets created by SpeakerFish and Siege
